overview:
EMPOWER is a powerful suite of online software that allows NYC property owners and managers to efficiently and effectively manage their portfolio.

Founded in 2008, EMPOWER pioneered the automated violation and compliance space by combining years of hands-on NYC real estate management and decades of experience in web technology and workflow automation.

EMPOWER is the most powerful tool on the market, with real-time data and powerful tools to manage complaints, violations, hearings, compliance, inspections, registrations, permits, job filings, finance statements, tax information, and water consumption data from DOB, HPD, ECB, DOF, FD NY, DSNY, DOH, DOT, EPA, DEP and NYPD, along with DOF charges from DHCR and DDC.

By streamlining day-to-day operations and keeping track of important dates and events, EMPOWER allows building owners and managers to save time and money.
